Package adrenaline.data.data_for_server.data_for_game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataForController
    This interface is implemented by every class that has the purpose of notifying the model of any changes during a match
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionBuilder
    This class is used to inform the model about which action type has been chosen for the current turn action
    AtomicTarget
    This class contains data about the targets chosen for each atomic weapon effect of the Shoot action
    ChosenEffect
    This class is used to inform the model about which weapon effect has been chosen for Shoot action
    ChosenMapSetUp
    This class is used to inform the model about which map has been chosen for the game
    ChosenPowerUp
    This class is used to inform the model about which power up has been chosen to perform an action
    ChosenPowerUpEffect
    This class is used to inform the model about which power up effect has been chosen the action
    ChosenSpawnPointSetUp
    This class is used to inform the model about the color of the room in which the client will spawn
    ChosenTargets
    This class is used to inform the model about which atomic targets have been chosen for Shoot action
    ChosenWeapon
    This class is used to inform the model about which weapon has been chosen for Shoot action
    DiscardedWeapon
    This class is used to inform the model about which weapon has been discarded
    NewPosition
    This class is used to inform the model about the id of the square where the client wants to move
    NewPositionAndGrabbed
    This class is used to inform the model about the id of the square where the client wants to move and the name of the weapon the want to grab
    ReloadResponse
    This class is used to inform the model about whether or not the client wants to reload any weapon and if so, which one they want to reload
    TagbackResponse
    This class is used to inform the model about whether or not the client wants to use Tagback Grenade
